
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1000000007
#define pii pair<int, int>
#define pll pair<long long, long long>
#define vi  vector<int>
#define pb  push_back
#define mp  make_pair
#define M(a,x) memset(a,x,sizeof(a))
#define sci(x) scanf("%d",&x);
#define scl(x) scanf("%lld",&x);
#define scs(x) scanf("%s",x);
#define print(x) printf("%d",x);
#define nl printf("\n")
#define printl(x) printf("%lld",x)
#define F(i,a,n) for(int i=a;i<n;i++)
#define INF 100000000000000000LL
#define LL long long

vector<bool> prime(200001,1);
int ans[2000005];
inline void sieve() {
    prime[0]=0;prime[1]=0;
    F(i,2,100000) {
	if(prime[i]) {
	    for(int j=i+i;j<=100000;j+=i) {
		prime[j]=0;
	    }
	}
    }
}
void solve(int l,int r) {
    int last=sqrt(r);
    M(ans,0);
    for(LL i=1;i*i<=r;i++) {
	LL sq = i*i;
	for(LL j=((l-1)/i+1)*i;j<=r;j+=i) {
	    if(j<sq) continue;
	    if(sq==j)
		ans[j-l]+=1;
	    else
		ans[j-l]+=2;
	}
    }
}
int main() {
    sieve();
    int t;sci(t);
    while(t--) {
	int l,r;
	sci(l);sci(r);
	solve(l,r);
	int cnt=0;
	F(i,l,r+1) {
	    if(prime[ans[i-l]]) cnt++;
	}
	cout<<cnt<<endl;
    }
}
